column2: Hey you, we got word from HQ that the General wants to speak with you. There is chopper coming to pick you up.
GET READY, WE ARE PICKING YOU UP NOW. OVER.
WE ARE GOING TO LAND NOW. GO TO THE FRONT GATE. GENERAL IS WAITING FOR YOU THERE.
Welcome private. At ease. we have good news for you, you are being promoted, congratulations!
You have proven your combat skills several times fighting the russians in the\nfront lines. It makes me proud to serve with you in the united states army.
With this promotion you get a squad of men under your command. Its great responsibility, but we believe you are ready.
Its your task to keep the men alive and to teach them the same skills you have achieved.
